testcase.classname: validation of Adactin Hotel Web Application of Order Id Generation
testcase.name: validate login page with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the Adactin Hotel Web Application Url..............passed When User should enter valid username and password..........................passed And Click login Button......................................................passed When User should select location from dropdown..............................passed And User should select Hotel from dropdown..................................passed And User should select Room Type from dropdown..............................passed And User should select No of Rooms from dropdown............................passed And User should Enter Checkin Date as per the Format mentioned..............passed And User should Enter Checkout Date as per the Format mentioned.............passed And User should select Adults per Room from dropdown........................passed And User should select Children per Room from dropdown......................passed And click Search button.....................................................passed When user should select the checklist.......................................passed And click Continue button...................................................passed When User should Enter First Name in the TextBox............................passed And User should Enter Last Name in the TextBox..............................passed And User should Enter Billing Address in the TextBox........................passed And User should Enter Credit Card No as per the Format mentioned in the TextBox.passed And User should select Credit Card Type from dropdown.......................passed And User should select Month and Year from Expiry Date dropdown............passed And User should Enter CVV Number in the CVV Number TextBox..................passed And click BookNow button....................................................passed Then verify and Order id should be displayed to the User....................passed
